Planar.h
1 #ifndef AMO_TOOLS_SUITE_PLANAR_H
2 #define AMO_TOOLS_SUITE_PLANAR_H
3 
4 #include <vector>
5 #include <cmath>
6 
7 // to be inherited by planes 3 and 3a, 3b
8 class VelocityPressureTraverseData {
9 public:
10  double getPv3Value() const {
11  return pv3;
12  }
13 
14  double get75percentRule() const {
15  return percent75Rule;
16  }
17 protected:
18  // protected constructor to be used only during the construction of its derived classes
19  VelocityPressureTraverseData(const double pitotTubeCoefficient,
20  std::vector< std::vector< double > > traverseHoleData)
21  : pitotTubeCoefficient(pitotTubeCoefficient), traverseHoleData(std::move(traverseHoleData))
22  {
23  double maxPv3r = 0.0;
24  double sumPv3r = 0.0;
25  for (auto & row : this->traverseHoleData) {
26  for (double & val : row) {
27  if (val <= 0) {
28  val = 0;
29  continue;
30  }
31  val *= std::pow(pitotTubeCoefficient, 2);
32  if (val > maxPv3r) {
33  maxPv3r = val;
34  }
35  sumPv3r += std::sqrt(val);
36  }
37  }
38 
39  pv3 = std::pow(sumPv3r / (this->traverseHoleData.size() * this->traverseHoleData[0].size()), 2);
40 
41  std::size_t count = 0;
42  for (auto & row : this->traverseHoleData) {
43  for (auto & val : row) {
44  if (val > (0.1 * maxPv3r)) count++;
45  }
46  }
47 
48  percent75Rule = count / static_cast<double>(this->traverseHoleData.size() * this->traverseHoleData[0].size());
49  }
50 
51  const double pitotTubeCoefficient;
52  double pv3 = 0, percent75Rule = 0;
53 
54  std::vector< std::vector< double > > traverseHoleData;
55 
56  friend class PlaneData;
57 };
58 
59 class Planar {
60 protected:
61  Planar(const double area, const double tdx, const double pbx, const double psx)
62  : dryBulbTemperature(tdx), barometricPressure(pbx), area(area), staticPressure(psx)
63  {}
64 
65  const double dryBulbTemperature, barometricPressure, area;
66  double gasDensity = 0, gasVelocity = 0, gasVolumeFlowRate = 0, gasVelocityPressure = 0, gasTotalPressure = 0;
67  double staticPressure = 0;
68 
69  friend class PlaneData;
70  friend class Fan203;
71 };
72 
73 class FlangePlane : public Planar {
74 public:
75  FlangePlane(const double area, const double tdx, const double pbx)
76  : Planar(area, tdx, pbx, 0) {}
77 };
78 
79 class TraversePlane : public Planar, public VelocityPressureTraverseData {
80 public:
81  TraversePlane(const double area, const double tdx, const double pbx, const double psx,
82  const double pitotTubeCoefficient, std::vector< std::vector< double > > traverseHoleData)
83  : Planar(area, tdx, pbx, psx),
84  VelocityPressureTraverseData(pitotTubeCoefficient, std::move(traverseHoleData))
85  {}
86 };
87 
88 class MstPlane : public Planar {
89 public:
90  MstPlane(const double area, const double tdx, const double pbx, const double psx)
91  : Planar(area, tdx, pbx, psx) {}
92 };
